DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Contact Sensitization Potential Of Tazarotene Foam On Skin In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , single center , evaluator-blinded , randomize , vehicle control study evaluate potential tazarotene foam 0.1 % induce contact sensitization follow repeat exposure maximal stress condition healthy adult volunteer . Approximately 240 healthy , male female , volunteer subject age 18 65 year enrol . All subject expose patch contain tazarotene foam vehicle foam . Inflammatory skin response ( eg , erythema , edema , papule ) superficial effect patch site visually assess score accord correspond grading scale . The study duration 6 week 9 week consist follow phase : 3 week Induction , 2 week Rest , 1 week Challenge , indicate , second 2 week Rest 1 week Repeat Challenge .
